name: Party Detective
description:
You are the Party Detective. You have been hired by the host of the event to prevent a murder from happening. Out of the many guests, there is One Killer.
Remain undercover by doing your job as a waiter & janitor.
Eavesdrop on your guests conversations to find clues to who the killer is
And shoot the killer before they kill the timer or your cover runs out.

___

This was my first Game Jam using Gamemaker Studio 2 and my god it was fun.
4 Days of full time design and development was stressful but insanely rewarding.
There were moments where I was going to give up on the project
but I'm so glad I pulled through and was able to deliver!
